reviews.review_msg: She does not post her lecture slides so you have to attend class. She is very caring, she want her students to understand the concept and not just memorize them. She want her students to succeed and do a good job. There are a lot of readings, the paper is fairly easy and the midterm and final are multiple choice.

I loved this class, I think it is important for every student to take. Lots of readings but they truly help to heighten your understanding of the material, a lot of which is brand new for most students. Attendance is mandatory, as you do some work in small groups during most classes and Joyce does not post lecture notes.
